synopsis.text:
Based on the provided synopses, here's a new synopsis for the anime:

Brandon Heat and Harry McDowell, two inseparable friends, lead a carefree life filled with local scuffles and petty crimes. However, their world takes a dark turn when they cross paths with Millennion, the most powerful mafia organization in the city. Forced to join its ranks, the duo finds themselves at the bottom of the hierarchy. While Harry harbors ambitions to climb the ladder and eventually lead Millennion, Brandon's only motivation is to protect the woman he loves, Maria, who is now under the custody of Millennion's leader, Big Daddy.

As they navigate the treacherous world of organized crime, Brandon and Harry's bond is put to the ultimate test. Betrayal and tragedy strike, and Brandon finds himself resurrected and driven by an insatiable thirst for revenge. With death no longer a barrier, he sets out to destroy Millennion and its monstrous enforcers, ultimately aiming to take down Harry, who has now become the very enemy he seeks to annihilate.

Gungrave is a gripping tale of friendship, love, and vengeance that unfolds over several years, leading to a dramatic conclusion that will leave viewers on the edge of their seats.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
